snippet: Ivory Coast feels that Didier Drogba’s impact is best used when he comes on as a substitute — as against Japan on Saturday, and maybe also against Colombia on Thursday and Greece.
abstract: Ivory Coast national soccer team feels that star forward Didier Drogba, who was used as a second-half catalyst in team's World Cup victory over Japan, might have changed the fortunes of his team; Ivory Coast now has a good chance of getting out of the group stage of a World Cup for the first time in three attempts.
lead_paragraph: Ivory Coast feels that Didier Drogba’s impact is best used when he comes on as a substitute — as against Japan on Saturday, and maybe also against Colombia on Thursday and Greece.

headline.main: Ivory Coast’s Cornerstone Becomes a Catalyst
headline.print_headline: Ivory Coast’s Cornerstone Becomes a Catalyst
